sqlMap.insert: insert INTO franchiseeAddLog (result, Date, b_id, b_name, b_number,b_address,b_tel,b_size,b_pccount,b_ip) VALUES(0,now(), #b_id#,#b_name#,#b_number#,#b_address#,#b_tel#,#b_size#,#b_pccount#,#b_ip#);
sqlMap.select: select num, result, date, b_id, finishDate, b_name, b_number, b_address, b_tel, b_size, b_pccount, b_ip, b_key from franchiseeAddLog where num >= #startRow# and num <= #endRow#
